name: Reset (itch) (Reset Game Studio)
description:
Reset is a shooter indie game to play on low end pc. With a female protagonist called Nina, you have to defeat an Artificial Intelligence who takes care of the world. Reset it´s a indie game made with unity and is in development. Our group of Indie developers are working hard to finish and improve the game. We put an Early access here for only US$1,00 and we expect you to help us to finish him.

We need to buy new musics, improve de AI of the enemies and do some other things

Thanks!!!
